meanings.definition: A surgical procedure to reshape or repair the nose.
meanings.sent1: After the accident, she underwent rhinoplasty to fix her broken nose.
meanings.sent2: Many people choose rhinoplasty to enhance their appearance.
meanings.sent3: The clown joked that he needed rhinoplasty to make his nose squeakier.
meanings.sent4: Her rhinoplasty transformed her nose like a sculptor shaping clay.
meanings.sent5: The before and after photos of her rhinoplasty were like night and day.

meanings.definition: The medical specialty concerned with the correction or reconstruction of the nose.
meanings.sent1: Dr. Smith specializes in rhinoplasty and has helped many patients breathe better.
meanings.sent2: Rhinoplasty is an important field in medicine that focuses on nasal health.
meanings.sent3: The hospital held a fundraiser to support the rhinoplasty department.
meanings.sent4: In the world of rhinoplasty, precision is key to successful surgeries.
meanings.sent5: The rhinoplasty conference brought together experts from around the globe.
